remarks: Deduction for membership in the class of path homotopies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:

isphtpyd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ s e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ) -> ( 1 H s ) = ( F ` 1 ) ) $.
